content:
TITLE: Integrating FormKit with Vue and Tailwind CSS DESCRIPTION: Example of how to set up FormKit with Vue and Tailwind CSS, including generating classes and configuring the FormKit plugin. SOURCE: https://github.com/formkit/formkit/blob/master/packages/tailwindcss/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_2 LANGUAGE: javascript CODE: ``` // app.js (or your main entry file) import { createApp } from 'vue' import App from './App.vue' import { plugin, defaultConfig } from '@formkit/vue' import { generateClasses } from '@formkit/tailwindcss' import './index.css' // wherever your Tailwind styles exist createApp(App) .use( plugin, defaultConfig({ config: { classes: generateClasses({ // Your theme will go here. // ... // text: { // label: 'font-bold text-gray-300 formkit-invalid:text-red-500', // ... // } // ... }), }, }) ) .mount('#app') ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Importing FormKit Development Tools DESCRIPTION: Shows how to import the @formkit/dev package. This package contains official FormKit development tools and is automatically included when using defaultConfig, but needs to be explicitly imported when using custom configurations. SOURCE: https://github.com/formkit/formkit/blob/master/packages/dev/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: javascript CODE: ``` import '@formkit/dev' ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Configuring Tailwind CSS for FormKit DESCRIPTION: Configuration for tailwind.config.js to include the FormKit Tailwind plugin. SOURCE: https://github.com/formkit/formkit/blob/master/packages/tailwindcss/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_1 LANGUAGE: javascript CODE: ``` // tailwind.config.js module.exports { ... plugins: [ require('@formkit/tailwindcss') ] ... } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Running FormKit CLI using NPX DESCRIPTION: Shows how to execute the FormKit command line tool using NPX, which allows running the tool without installing it globally. SOURCE: https://github.com/formkit/formkit/blob/master/packages/cli/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: sh CODE: ``` $ npx formkit ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Installing and Running FormKit Vue Starter Project DESCRIPTION: These commands install the necessary dependencies and start the development server for the FormKit Vue starter project. It assumes that FormKit has already been installed and the project setup is complete. SOURCE: https://github.com/formkit/formkit/blob/master/packages/tailwindcss/playground/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` npm install npm run dev ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Importing FormKit Icons Package DESCRIPTION: Demonstrates how to import the complete FormKit icons package into a project. This import statement makes all FormKit icons available for use in the application. SOURCE: https://github.com/formkit/formkit/blob/master/packages/icons/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: javascript CODE: ``` import '@formkit/icons' ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Installing @formkit/tailwindcss Package DESCRIPTION: Command to install the @formkit/tailwindcss package using npm. SOURCE: https://github.com/formkit/formkit/blob/master/packages/tailwindcss/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` npm install @formkit/tailwindcss ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: HTML Image and Link Layout for FormKit Logo DESCRIPTION: HTML markup for displaying the FormKit logo with light/dark mode support and centered alignment. Includes links to documentation and status badges. SOURCE: https://github.com/formkit/formkit/blob/master/packages/formkit/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: html CODE: ```

``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Status Badges HTML Layout DESCRIPTION: HTML markup for displaying project status badges including build status, npm version, and license information. SOURCE: https://github.com/formkit/formkit/blob/master/packages/formkit/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_1 LANGUAGE: html CODE: ```

```
